summary: A player home inside a cave, behind a waterfall.
descriptionHtml:
Cliffwatch is a player home located within a cave near Ivarstead hidden behind a waterfall. I wanted a house that gave a sense of adventure without feeling overly generous towards the player\'s ego. The entrance emphasizes natural beauty with waterfalls and dramatic lighting while the interior house feels cozy and functional. There is a small hidden area in the cave for crafting and storing your most highly valued items.


Comes with
 - The Art of War, by Sun Tzu
 - Unfortune, a short 8-part story written by me that explains Cliffwatch
 - Three sets of light armor based on mage robes; ready to be custom enchanted
 - Crafting stations of all kinds
 - Plenty of great places to sit and catch up on your in-game reading


In the most recent version I\'ve...
- Added a lot of plants to beautify the main cave, it looks much better
- The water in the main cave is no longer opaque and has a collision plane below it to fix any potential falling through the level
- The Grotto area of the cave has been relocated to for much easier access. There is now a hidden floor panel in the bedroom
- Several typos and item placement errors were fixed
- The trees in the main cave and the banners in the house no longer animate; I always thought it looked kind of weird

*I recommend using a high resolution static map mod to really enhance the map room.



[size=3]SPOILER[/size]
The house keys are located...
[color=#282828]The first is the main house key directly on your left after entering the house\'s front door. 
The second is in the crafting area of the cave, next to the bed, on the table. This one is only used for the display room. [/color]
The backstory journals are located...
[color=#282828]
In the map room of the house in the lower, side desk. [/color]
[size=3]SPOILER[/size]



>> INSTALLATION <<

Extract contents to Skyrim\\Data folder

>> UNINSTALLATION <<
 Delete the following

Cliffwatch.esp ... (Skyrim\\Data\\)

CLWAhousebase2.nif ... (Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Architecture\\CLWA)
CLWAbannterstatic1.nif ... (Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Architecture\\CLWA)
CLWAbannterstatic2.nif ... (Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Architecture\\CLWA)
CLWAbannterstatic3.nif ... (Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Architecture\\CLWA)

ArtofWarB.png ... (Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Clutter\\Books\\Images)
ElementsB.png ... (etc)
KnowThyselfB.png ... (etc)
KnowThyself2B.png ... (etc)
Points.png ... (etc)
Victory.png ... (etc)
author: Sireyn
